titleInfo.title: Map of the Coast from Kurrachee to Guadur showing the route traversed by Major Goldsmid and party

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Pen and ink with wash on tracing clothDimensions:171 x 821 mm, on sheet 243 x 900 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Relief shown by shading.Territories under rule of Imam of Muscat, Khan of Khelat and Jam of Bhelah separated by red lines.The constructed telegraph line shown in blue, telegraph under construction indicated by pecked line. Major Goldsmidâ€™s route shown in black dotted line.Inscriptions:In the lower centre below key illegible signature.
